Articles.Content:
This is my attempt to recreate the Tu-95 Bear to the best of my ability... It can take off from a short distance.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The closest thing I could do to get "contra-rotating" propellers is have one propeller behind the square strut and another in front of the square strut... And one other thing... flying this is quite a chore.

Mods used: Firespitter, Spaceplane Plus

Craft file:

http://www./view/25c919q6afdc9a3/Tu-95_Bear.craft

Here are some other craft I did:

McDonnell F-101 Voodoo
